this method changes the icon to represent the appropriate actor, either an asteroid or a ship

setUserDisplayPreference(boolean) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
This method sets the user display preference to that which is entered by the user from method userDisplayPreference().
shipsDestroyed - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
Used for counting number of ships that are destroyed.
shipsEscaped - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
Used for counting number of ships that have escaped.
SpaceExplorationSimulator - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation
A turn-based simulation that displays randomized Space Ships and Asteroids along with their movements and interactions on a grid.
SpaceExplorationSimulator() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
This is the no argument constructor for SpaceExplorationSimulator It contains no parameters It is chained to SpaceExplorationSimulator(int,int,int,boolean)
SpaceExplorationSimulator(int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
This is a parameterized constructor which receives three int arguments and a boolean value
SpaceProgram - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.section302.simulation
A class to run and test class SpaceExplorationSimulator.
